full_threads.body:
Hi Joel,

It's still not populating. This is how it should look, with the Stylist automatically selected as the sales person.

Warm regards,

Jen Lovegrove

ASSISTANT TO SENIOR PROPERTY STYLISTS



+61 450 909 043



+61 2 9310 1611

(Time: 30mins)

Hi Jen,

Thanks so much for picking that up. I’ve run a few tests on my side—could you please check if the Sales Person is now coming through as expected?

If not, would you mind sending me a quick screenshot of how it’s displaying on your end (both now and from when it was working correctly), so I can compare and make sure everything is aligned?

Really appreciate your help with this.

Hi Joel,

Quotes seem to be generating invoices now, however when they're generated the sales person isn't feeding through into the invoice automatically. Could you please make sure the stylist for each proposal is the sales person on the invoice?

Warm regards,

Jen Lovegrove

Hi Jen,

Thanks so much for the update.

Could you give it another try when you get a chance?

I’ve manually triggered the invoices for you, and I’ll dig deeper into this to make sure nothing is slipping through when a proposal is accepted.

I’ve also updated all the plugins, so things should be running smoothly now — but if you spot anything at all, please let me know and I’ll jump on it right away.

Actually sorry I take that back - a quote was accepted last night and no invoice generated 😭

Warm regards,

Hi Jen,

Thanks so much for the update — really glad to hear things are working well on your side.

We ran some tests last night and everything seems to be working smoothly on our end as well.

We’ve also been running plugin updates in staging, and those are looking good so far. We’ll be rolling these out shortly and will keep you updated along the way.

Really appreciate your patience as we continue refining things.

Thanks Joel. We had some quotes accepted over the weekend via EFT and they generated invoices.

Warm regards,

Jen Lovegrove

Thanks so much for following up and for sharing the details.

We’re now digging deeper into the issue, and you might see some Xero test activity over the next couple of days as we work to fully validate and resolve it. I’ll make sure to keep you posted as soon as we have a clear fix in place.

Appreciate your patience while we get this sorted.

Hi Joel,

We had some quote acceptances yesterday, all to be paid via EFT and none generated invoices. This issue has been ongoing for weeks and is incredibly frustrating and time consuming for us to manually create and reconcile in Xero.

10/23 Westminster Ave

25B Cammeray Rd

25 Cammeray Rd

Could you please take another look at this issue and let me know once resolved? Please do not regenerate invoices as we will be having double ups since we are manually creating these invoices.

Thank you.

Warm regards,

Jen Lovegrove
